# MarketplaceV3EnglishAuctions.getAuction() method

Get a single english auction

## Example

```javascript
const auctionId = 0;
const auction = await contract.englishAuctions.getAuction(auctionId);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
getAuction(auctionId: BigNumberish): Promise<EnglishAuction>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description    |
| --------- | ------------ | -------------- |
| auctionId | BigNumberish | the auction Id |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[EnglishAuction](./sdk.englishauction.md)&gt;

the Auction object
